data.name: Goodbye Dr. Sanchez
data.detailed_description:
You and your friend have been kidnapped by the maniacal Dr. Carlos Sanchez, a well-known professor and scientist, now inflicted by an irreversible condition that causes progressive degeneration. Sanchez brings it upon himself to "educate" his newly-made captives through capital punishment.
One of you managed to escape the room in which you've been trapped, and now is wandering through the house. But the other remains imprisoned in a room with the necessary equipment to find the exit. Find it and escape together without Sanchez seeing you!

GAMEPLAY

One player, known as the Prisoner, may be captive, but that's not without invaluable information. The other, AKA the Fugitive, can explore the house, but has no idea where to go. There are locked doors and hidden traps that can only be seen by the Prisoner. The both of you must communicate to overcome these obstacles.

The Prisoner

The Prisoner has been confined to a room, but has all the information pertaining to the layout of the house thanks to the 5 screens at their disposal. By using that info, the Prisoner must guide the Fugitive to his/her rescue and then plan an escape route from Sanchez's house.

The Fugitive

The Fugitive, whilst running through the house, looks for keys to open doors, evading traps that they cannot see with their eyes; their locations can only be relayed through the Prisoner. You must also avoid Sanchez, who's going around the house, looking for you. If he sees you, he'll place the Helmet of Motivation upon your head. It has various arms with attached drills that slowly creep to burrow into the Fugitive's head. You do not want to know what happens after. You must deactivate it!


To do this, while the Helmet of Motivation is active, the Fugitive must search for codes spread throughout the house. You need to give the prisoner the code each time this happens, who will promptly input the code and deactivate the helmet. Upon deactivation, the house experiences a short in its electronics for a small duration, disabling traps for about 15 seconds.

KEY FEATURES

  • Communicate with your partner in order to traverse the house.
  • Explore the house while avoiding traps and Dr. Sanchez who wonder looking for the pieces for his experiment.
  • Have fun trying to solve obstacles and find your way using spoken communication with your partner as the only tool.
  • Rescue your friend and escape right from the house where Sanchez has you captive.

AND NEW MAPS AND MECHANICS ON THE WAY!

data.short_description: You and your friend have been kidnapped by the maniacal Dr. Carlos Sanchez. One of you managed to escape and now is wandering through the house. But the other remains imprisoned in a room with the necessary equipment to find the exit. The both of you must communicate to escape together!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i3, i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 6670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i5 8600k, i7 8750h or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This is a horror game. It does not contains explicit graphic violence, it does not shows but implies a gore death for the characters in case of failure. Other than that, there is no violence displayed in the game.
